reviewText: Creepy stories with sympathetic central characters.

One of my favorite anime so when I saw there was a complete series pack I had to get it! This anime doesn't have a second season but this first season is finished up quite nicely. Worth the watch and the price.

When I was a bit younger I happened upon this show on a now retired channel, AZN. That channel use to be my go to for anime when I didn't have access to any other methods of watching it. Well. Anything Japanese I suppose. Anyway, I loved this show with a burning passion! I ultimately began to practice a new style of art after seeing it and it really helped me gain more attention which ultimately led to the kickstart of my online career as an artist. Well, there were a variety of influences, but this was definitely one! I loved the story. ANYWAY

Ill save you the story, for now, and skip straight to the only problem Ive had so far. When I received the package everything looked fine, but then I heard a noise that made my heart drop - the clanking sound of dvds moving around freely within the case. Its likely not the fault of the elder, but even still I had to open the DVD case in order to correct it. Seeing as to how I bought it for collection purposes, that bothered me some and I will likely replace it because of tha alone.
The disks end up having little marks on them because of all the movement, so that is my second reason for replacing them.

All that aside, Im glad it came so quickly! I cant fault the seller for what happened during transport, but I still only give four stars for the off chance that they sent it to me despite the fact that the disks were loose.

Will write a proper review of the show on a later date.

I m a girl, and I love this anime, and most yaoi animes! The stories are awesomely and beautifully twisted and the characters become more than their gender, they become people that don't fit into typical stereotypes often portrayed in anime. Descendants of Darkness is the perfect combinations of sensual foreplay and psychosis with a dark and eerie atmosphere.
Love it and hard to find dvd thank you

great anime
works great and fast shipping
5/5
came on time
I love this show and it's great to have the whole series in one set. The DVD arrived well packaged and in great condition.
I am pumped to see this item in such amazing condition.
